  • Constructor Details

    • LoginManager

      public LoginManager(ArrayList<User> userList, ArrayList<Movie> movieList, MovieJsonOperator jsonOperator)
      sets the instances of UserList, MovieList, and Main.MovieJsonOperator so that the info in those json files can be used here
      Parameters:
      userList - canonical list of all user accounts
      movieList - canonical list of all movies in the json file
      jsonOperator - object that directly handles json data

      Returns:
